doc.repnme: La Mauritanie perd 11,8 milliards MRO chaque année à cause d'un mauvais assainissement
doc.abstracts: Mauritania loses 11.8 billion Ouguiya every year owing to poor sanitation, which is equivalent to 41 million USD according to a document review conducted by the Water and Sanitation Program (WSP). This amount is equivalent to 13.1 USD per capita per year in Mauritania, or 1.2percent of GDP. 0.7 million Mauritanians use unhygienic latrines or shared latrines. 1.7 million have no latrines and defecate in the open. The open defecation costs Mauritania 30.4 million USD. However, the elimination of this practice would require the construction and use of less than 350,000 latrines.
